name: project
description: ### Plan Ini isi apaan ### Code: Git ### Build npm ### Test OWASP ZAP ### Release & Deploy Jenkins ### Operate Docker ### Monitor Prometheus

scripts.build: mkdir -p public/css public/js && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css public/css/ && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js public/js/ && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js public/js/
scripts.start: npm run build && echo 'Project built! Run your PHP server manually'
